title: Natural Ways to Prevent Seasonal Fever
summary: To avoid seasonal fever, wash hands frequently, maintain good hydration, eat immune-boosting foods, and avoid contact with infected individuals.
author: Dr. Anika Rahman

title: Healthy Diet Plan for Diabetic Patients
summary: Diabetics should eat fiber-rich vegetables, avoid sugary drinks, reduce processed carbs, and monitor blood sugar regularly for better health control.
author: Nutritionist Farzana Jahan

title: Safe Use and Dosage of Paracetamol
summary: Paracetamol is effective for pain and fever relief, but overdose may harm your liver. Follow instructions carefully and avoid frequent unsupervised use.
author: Dr. Ahsan Kabir

title: Obesity: Causes, Risks and Solutions
summary: Obesity increases the risk of heart problems and diabetes. Manage it with regular workouts, low-calorie meals, and professional medical guidance.
author: Dr. Mahmud Hasan

title: Tips to Improve Sleep Quality Naturally
summary: Maintain a regular sleep schedule, reduce screen time before bed, avoid heavy meals late at night, and create a calm environment for deep, restful sleep.

title: Hydration: Why Drinking Water is Essential
